text: [Music]
once upon a time there was a small
island of boatman and fishermen ruled by
King mandrin the people of this kingdom
might have been the happiest people in
the world
[Music]
but for one big enemy the boat this
cannot be
it is the prince in the castle below the

quit battle to the shore fast
looks like my net has caught a really

one of the wicked water princes monsters
again
[Music]
in the past week the water Prince has
attacked our boats five times your
highness your highness all our attempts
at finding him and fighting him have
failed don't worry father I shall find
him and fight him I shall read all the
books on his magic and when I grow up I
will avenge all the trouble he has put
our people through the little prince was
so determined to fight and defeat the

Prince started getting scared a few days
later the little prince was out boating
at sea that is when the water Prince
created such a ripple in the water that
the princes boat sunk while he allowed
the other little boys to swim up to the
surface of the water
he held on tightly to the priest and
dragged him to his palace the entire
kingdom was horrified to know if their
prince being kidnapped
everyone was sunk in despair is it how
it is always going to be we shall suffer
for no fault of ours at the hands of
that weak in water Prince we have never
done any harm to him all we want is to
live peacefully on our beautiful island
why does the water Prince enjoy hurting
us so it is his fear for he really
thought like a prince he'll grow up and
defeat him which means there definitely

uncle how do you always manage to be so
positive Rena who will find a way to
defeat the wicked water Prince I wish I
could but don't worry uncle nature
always finds a way to help those who
have never harmed anyone and even the
water Prince is not all that evil
how can you say that Marlena after all
that he has done well all he has done is
upturned our boats and scare us with his
monsters
he has never harmed us in any bad way I
mean we Island people have been so used
of water that we can remain inside water
for hours like fishes so whatever the
water Prince does only scares us or
troubles us but it does not really hurt
us or harm us in any way
I am sure that even our prince is safe
with him I think the water Prince is a
little lonely I wish we could just find
him and talk to him only Merlin I can
see good in the wicked water Prince
truly your sense of compassion is
unmatched
the chief wise men of the kingdom had
locked himself up in his cave he was
poring over all the texts and books of

water Prince
he found the answer he got out of his

headed out to where Marlena stayed the

father
boatman reven was there reven was
shocked to see the chief Wiseman himself
at his door
the chief Wiseman himself come in sir
[Music]
what can I possibly do for you sir
I wanted talk to you about your daughter
marina I need her to rescue our prince
well she is just a little girl sir how
will she find the palace of the wicked
water Prince when even the king's army
could not I have been studying the
legends of the water prince for a long
time the prince lives in the energy of
fear and sadism and we need a person
like your daughter to defeat him
I do not understand let me ask you three
things about your daughter one has
merlina ever hurt any creature and never
I don't think there is a single man
woman child plant or animal who could
ever say that my Marlena has heard any
of them in fact she thinks that even
though water prince is not wicked but
rather only scared and lonely excellent
question - does Marlena believe in the

always says that nature always helps
anyone who does not harm others in fact
she is certain that there is a way to
get our prince back perfect and question
three
have you ever known milena to be scared
I don't think so because she trusts

plus she always speaks the truth so she
has nothing to be afraid about call her
very well
Marlena or Elena c'mere child
yes Father good day sir
good day Marlena will you go and rescue

honor with the wicked water Prince is
there under the sea if the water Prince
really wanted to hurt us he would have

lonely plus what is there to be afraid

within it are my friends oh sure that
settles it you will have to go and bring

compassion goodness and fearlessness
will show you the way so the next day
the entire kingdom stood on the beach as
Marlena fearlessly daidzein to the scene
to find their little prince soon she
reached the palace of the water priests
the first gate of the palace was made of
stones and was guarded by two giants
they saw merlina
and stopped her and I come from the
island kingdom I have come here to
rescue our Marlena would never speak
anything but the truth but the Giants
could not believe that the island king
would send a little girl to rescue his
precious son nor did they think that
when the island Kings armies had failed
a little girl could harm their water
Prince in any way so they laughed and
let her pass
the next gate was a huge bubble of water
merlina could now see the palace through
it the palace was as though made of
bubbles of water only those bubbles were
in the shape of long walls tall towers
and pillars protected by the bubble gate
as soon as Marlena touched it the bubble
swallowed her anyone would have been
scared to be trapped inside the bubble
but Marlene as faith was unmoved water
and its bubbles are made by nature and
nature always helps those who'll never
harm anyone
as soon as Marlena said these words with
all the faith and conviction in her
heart the bubble around her burst and
wid the bubble the entire Palace too
started imploding the water Prince was
terrified to see the towers and pillars
of his palace implode Marlena swam to
where he was the water Prince started to
escape he had never thought that his
magical palace would be destroyed that
too passed his Giants by a little girl
but before he could escape Marlena
called out to him kindly water Prince
please do not run away we can be friends
you know friends aren't you scared of me
right now I think you are scared of me
but I know you are not evil if you had
really meant any harm you would have
hurt our prince you think I am NOT Eva
even after the way I troubled your
people I think you are just lonely right
you want some friends but who will be
friends with me everyone thinks I am
wicked ah come with me see the beautiful
world above nobody on the island will
hurt you I promise
nobody has ever tried to understand the
reason why I behave the way I do you are
the first person to extend the hand of
kindness towards me see if someone
troubles you there is a good chance that
they're just lonely and don't know how
to be friends try reaching out to them
just as Marlena reached out to the water
Prince and just as Marlena had faith
that mother nature would always help the
person who never harms anyone and that
made her fearless have faith that if you
are good
eventually good things will happen to
you to try to understand the reason why
a person behaves a certain way rather
than hating on them or being afraid the
world needs people who can understand
rather than judge and fight
